subject: Implement fun style guide across entire UI
body:
Full implementation of the creative design system:
- Primary palette: Electric Violet (#8B5CF6), Hot Pink accent
- Dark mode uses deep indigo (#0F0F23) instead of pure black
- New Tailwind config with custom colors, gradients, and glow shadows
- Updated all components from blue/gray to violet/zinc colors
- Added display font family for headings
- Micro-animations: btn-scale, card-lift utility classes
- Gradient progress bar during export
- Glow effects on primary buttons in dark mode
- Reduced motion support for accessibility

Build passes successfully.
